mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product ( pro_Name,pro_Type, pro_Num,pro_State, pro_img,pro_info, createdUser, createdTime, modifiedUser, modifiedTime ) VALUE ( #{pro_Name}, #{pro_Type}, #{pro_Num}, #{pro_State}, #{pro_img}, #{pro_info}, #{createdUser}, #{createdTime}, #{modifiedUser}, #{modifiedTime} )
mapper.select: SELECT pid, pro_Name,pro_Type, pro_Num,pro_State, pro_img,pro_info FROM product WHERE pid=#{pid}
mapper.update: UPDATE product SET pro_Name=#{pro_Name},pro_Type=#{pro_Type}, pro_Num=#{pro_Num}, pro_State=#{pro_State}, pro_info=#{pro_info}, modifiedUser=#{modifiedUser},modifiedTime=#{modifiedTime} WHERE pid=#{pid}
UPDATE product SET pro_img=#{pro_img}, modifiedUser=#{modifiedUser}, modifiedTime=#{modifiedTime} WHERE pid=#{pid}
